AI Description: Parallel netCDF (pnetCDF) is a library providing high-performance I/O facilities for applications running on parallel distributed computing platforms. It is built on top of the widely-used netCDF file format and offers parallel I/O capabilities for reading and writing data in a scalable and efficient manner.
Core Features: Parallel I/O Support, High-Performance Data Access, Compatible With Netcdf File Format, Scalability On Distributed Computing Platforms
General Tags: Parallel I/O, Data Access, Distributed Computing, High Performance Computing
